page.title: 03MAIDEN CASTLE SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: This is the main sporting complex belonging to Durham University.The facilities are also available to the public for a small booking fee. There is a large sports hall catering for football,cricket,badminton etc. There are also squash courts,a multi gym,both grass and hard tennis courts and a large all weather sports pitch used for football,netball etc.The centre also has a 400 metre running track with a full range of field event facilities.Around the centre there are numerous football,rugby,hockey and cricket pitches.There are also changing rooms with showers. As well as the sports facilities there are also snack machines,a sports shop and a socialising area.
